}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== PIX-LINK LV-WR02 :Home Mini AC 300Mbps 2.4G Wireless WiFi Router :Signal Range Extender, 2 External Antennas
The Wireless-N Router is a combined wired and wireless network connection device :designed specifically for small business and home office networking requirements. The Wireless-N Router is a high speed solution that is compatible with 802.11b/g/n. :Based on 802.11n technology, It gives users wireless performance at up to 300Mbps, :which can meet your most demanding home networking needs, such as HD streaming, :online gaming and large files downloading.
===Features=== <small> :- Complies with 802.11n to provide a wireless data rate of up to 300Mbps. :- One 10/100M Auto-Negotiation RJ45 WAN port, one 10/100M Auto-Negotiation RJ45 LAN ports. :- Supporting :- Auto MDI/MDIX, Provides WPA/WPA2, WPA-PSK/WPA2-PSK encryption security. :- Shares data and Internet access for users, supporting Dynamic IP/Static IP/PPPoE/PPTP/L2TP. :- Supports DMZ host, Dynamic DNS, Static Routing. :- Provides Automatic-connection and Scheduled Connection on certain time to the Internet. :- Built-in DHCP server supporting static IP address distributing. :- Built-in firewall supporting IP address, Domain Name, and MAC address filtering. :- Connects Internet on demand and disconnects from the Internet when idle for PPPoE. :- Supports WPS button. :- Supports firmware upgrade and Web management :- Two External Antennas. :- Built-in power adapter, no bulky adapter needed. :- Supports Router, Repeater, WISP, Client and AP mode </small> Latest firmware revision: v28K.MiniRouter.20160820 (as of July 2017)
This router is sold i.e. on AliExpress, eBay as Pix-Link or PIXLink and as well brand-less. <!-- ===See also=== * [http://unknownSupport.com/unknown.html Unknown Support page, please edit link if you know it] * [http://unknownManufacturer.com/unknown.html Unknown Manufacturer page, please edit link if you know it] -->
